author: sussman
msg: Continue fleshing out new public fs locking funcs in BDB.  With striker.
(svn_fs_unlock):  clarify the error codes this new API returns.
(svn_fs_get_lock_from_token):  don't return NULL;  throw a key error.
(svn_fs_base__get_lock_from_token):  don't return NULL; throw a key error.

author: striker
msg: With sussman sit up through the night fixin' things...
return a NULL lock, as documented.

author: striker
msg: With a thank you to Greg Hudson and Branko Cibej, fix the lock-tokens table

author: sussman
msg: Various cleanups to lock table functions.
(svn_fs_bdb__lock_delete): return the error code we claim to return.
(svn_fs_bdb__lock_token_delete): return the error code we claim to return.
